  • 方法详细资料

    • getSlice

      public EntryList getSlice​(KeySliceQuery query, StoreTransaction txh) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: KeyColumnValueStore
      Retrieves the list of entries (i.e. column-value pairs) for a specified query.
      指定者:
      getSlice 在接口中 KeyColumnValueStore
      覆盖:
      getSlice 在类中 KCVSProxy
      参数:
      query - Query to get results for
      txh - Transaction
      返回:
      List of entries up to a maximum of "limit" entries
      抛出:
      BackendException - when columnEnd < columnStart
      另请参阅:
      KeySliceQuery

    • getSlice

      public Map<StaticBuffer,​EntryList> getSlice​(List<StaticBuffer> keys, SliceQuery query, StoreTransaction txh) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: KeyColumnValueStore
      Retrieves the list of entries (i.e. column-value pairs) as specified by the given SliceQuery for all of the given keys together.
      指定者:
      getSlice 在接口中 KeyColumnValueStore
      覆盖:
      getSlice 在类中 KCVSProxy
      参数:
      keys - List of keys
      query - Slicequery specifying matching entries
      txh - Transaction
      返回:
      The result of the query for each of the given keys as a map from the key to the list of result entries.
      抛出:
      BackendException
